code: import{useState}from"react";import api from"../api";import'./AddRecipes.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AddRecipes(){const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[ingredients,setIngredients]=useState('');const[instructions,setInstructions]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[image,setImage]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData();formData.append('title',title);formData.append('description',description);formData.append('ingredients',ingredients);formData.append('instructions',instructions);formData.append('image',image);try{const res=await api.post("/recipes",formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/formData','Authorization':"Bearar ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}});alert('המתכון נוסף בהצלחה',res.data);setTitle('');setDescription('');setIngredients('');setInstructions('');setImage(null);}catch(err){alert('שגיאת בהוספת מתכון');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-recipe-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u05D4\u05D5\u05E1\u05E4\u05EA \u05DE\u05EA\u05DB\u05D5\u05DF"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"\u05DB\u05D5\u05EA\u05E8\u05EA",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"\u05EA\u05D9\u05D0\u05D5\u05E8",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"\u05DE\u05E6\u05E8\u05DB\u05D9\u05DD",value:ingredients,onChange:e=>setIngredients(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"\u05D4\u05D5\u05E8\u05D0\u05D5\u05EA \u05D4\u05DB\u05E0\u05D4",value:instructions,onChange:e=>setInstructions(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:e=>setImage(e.target.files[0])}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,children:"\u05E9\u05DE\u05D5\u05E8"})]});}
